in samaharak nam: thamage gedarin pitatha giya wita noyek thanwala di boho aahara panadiya labima, ohu nisa (ee maithri karana thanaththa aashraya karagena) boho dena jiwath wana bawa, giya giya gam ratawaladi puja sathkara labima, ohu kara sorun lan nowima, rajugenuth awaman nolabima, kisi sathureku nathi wima, sabhawakata pamini wita owunowun wisin sathutu karanu labima, siyalu nayan athuren uthumaku wima, guna kirthi usulannaku wima, aishwaryayen babalannaku wima, sapathin paha nowima, gawayan bowima, kumbauru saru wima, daruwangen sapa windinnata labima, pihita nathi thanwala di pawa pihita labima, sathuranta mada pawathwiya nohaki keneku wima aadiyayi.

ee anuwa jathika giye sampurna wadana kalaya lesa miniththu 2yi thappara 19k lesa sandahan we. 1955 pebarawari 4 wenida shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe di demala bhasha madhyayen thati gatha karana ladi.

kawurun kohoma koyi handen koyi lesaka beduwath ammala ammalama bawath , appachichla appachichlama bawath pasak wimata nam apitath idahita kohenma ho kawuruhari path wi kan handakin bediya yuthumaya.apita kese wethath mata ese wu bawa piliganimata mama lajja nowemi.ese sidu wu bawa sagawimata tharam adhamayekuda nowemi.api athara itha honda sabadakamak nothibunu bawa sabaya.appachchita mama aadaraya kala tharamatama mama amma samanga anchi allannata atha.mata wada mallita aadare bawa kiyamin nokkadu kiyannata atha.namudu daruwekuge kandulu kata dekak abiyasadi le bamme sawimathkama kothekda yanna mama ada pasak kota gathimi.kata nathath nubata ma ketharam aganeda yanna ada mage ruhiru sisara gos ata mindulu walata pawa danunu bawa pawasuwoth eya musawak nam nowanu atha.ma numbaatada nosahena tharamata aadaraya kalemi.namudu kawadath ee aadara goden kalandak dekak appachchige ginumata bara wima mata koyi lesakinwath walakwalimata nohaki wiya.idin binden binda ekathu wu aadaraya ohuge ginum sheshaya ihala damimata matada nodanima withthikaru wanuye anekeku nowa mamamaya.namudu ada gatha wu pas wisi wasara purawatama sidu nowu lesin eka alpenithi thudaka tharamwath wenasak nowi ginum sheshayan samana wi atha.
